review: Its a new world good bye ATT uverse!!!!
author: m

review: The fire stick is a great device! I'm very disappointed for Comcast not being a recognized cable provider on the HBO GO app but that's not Amazon's fault. Sign up and pre pay 3 months with sling TV and get the fire stick for free. That's what I did :)
author: Michael Cinzano

review: Works great!  Saving me money and easy to operate!
author: Lyn Garner

review: My family loves the fire stick. If you have decent wireless internet this performs flawlessly.
author: Amazon Customer

review: It has stopped working. It will not load up. It comes up to" Home Loading", but does not load. I have rebooted it a couple of times with out any change. Do I need a new stick?
author: Richard A Gates

review: it was a nice try.it did not have its listed amount of memory.has the same as the firetv box.it is easy to upload kodi and other programs to it.not all will run right.they do put out a beautiful picture.the screen savers are the best to watch.fantastic portraits.both units have amazon looking over your back.it would be nice to just have the unit to yourself.but you are constantly tracked.both units are now back in their boxes.kodi has to many limits on them.i have a unit coming from china with 32gb of memory in it.it is a dual computer.windows 8 and android 4.4.it should be something.intel cpu.small but powerful.
author: ray

review: I love it, love it, love it..... Did I mention that I love it.
author: J. Getty "Mermaid"
